snippet.title: Broken Ranks - Closed Beta trailer
snippet.description:
The trailer announcing the beginning of the second stage of the beta tests of Broken Ranks, the successor of the acclaimed Polish MMORPG - The Pride of Taern.

You can sign up for the beta here: https://www.brokenranks.com/

Visit vibrant cities, remote mountaintops, mysterious settlements, and terrifying ruins inhabited by powerful creatures that cast a shadow over the human world. To the brave adventurers who dare to defeat the most powerful monsters, the world offers riches, fame, and power. To the weak and scared, only oblivion.

Visit our social medias:
https://www.facebook.com/BrokenRanks
https://www.facebook.com/WhitemoonGames
https://www.reddit.com/r/BrokenRanksOfficial
https://twitter.com/Whitemoon_Games
